title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-1.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-1.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

Part 240 establishes the department's transportation
conformity requirements. Applicability for this program is defined at
40
CFR
93.102
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
240-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
